basics.name: Henry Korver
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Physics in the Department of Arts and Sciences at the University of Hawaii.

education.institution: University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa, Honolulu, HI

work.company: University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa Chemistry Department
work.summary: Researcher under Dr. Tosaporn Sattasathuchana at University the Hawaiʻi at Mānoa as part of the GAMESS collaboration
highlights: Executed and deployed GAMESS code to run on the KOA HPC using bash and Python scripting
Analyzed and visualized data using the Seaborn and Matplotlib Python libraries
Compared basis-set effects for the X18 and S22 molecular databases
Attended regular meetings regarding quantum chemistry research

work.company: University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa Physics Department
work.summary: Worked under Dr. Jelena Maricic and Dr. Ranjan Dharmapalan as part of the DUNE collaboration
highlights: Operated a vacuum chamber and high-powered laser with respect to proper safety guidelines
Performed measurements of the photoelectric effect
Used NUMPY and ROOT in the context of particle physics

work.company: University of Hawaiʻi at Mānoa Physics Department
work.summary: Worked under the late Dr. Gary Varner as part of the HMBV3 project
highlights: Used a 3D printer to make custom PCB mounts
Attended regular meetings on electrical engineering-related topics

volunteer.summary: Founded and ran a large outdoor activity club with regular meetings
highlights: Managed club meetings with regular attendance of 20+ members
Applied for and received funding for new climbing equipment
Instructed students on safe and responsible climbing practices

awards.title: UROP funding recipient
awards.summary: Grant received to perform Computational Chemistry research in the Spring Semester
